name: Dressology
description: Don’t leave dressing well to chance! Project Gentleman’s Dress-ol-ogy will be your guide to personal and professional success in dress.  This comprehensive guide to dressing and grooming will equip any man for what the day or night offers. Written in a no nonsense, practical manner, you will gain knowledge based on years of real life experience. Dress-ol-ogy also discusses the very important topic of grooming in a way that every man can understand, and every woman will love.  Dress-ol-ogy is a must have for any gentleman, or gentleman to be!

name: The Grooming Revolution
description: How is it that some guys seem to “get it”, and some guys just DON’T?  Men who are well groomed get what they want.  Men who are under or over groomed look just plain weird.  Where is the balance?  What kind of haircut should you get? How much cologne should you wear?  What about hair control?  What is my date or employer going to think when I step before them?  Don’t underestimate the importance of grooming!  The Grooming Revolution will provice real answers and get you real results!

name: Dressology & The Grooming Revolution
description: When you buy both books for $20.97 you will recieve a combined savings of over $6.00.
